description: Determines the quality of customer service interactions at Canadian Forces
full_summary:
#### Canadian Forces Recruiting Group Mystery Shopper Services
#### Services de client mystère du Groupe de recrutement des Forces canadiennes

**Notice Reference**: cb-276-40967836

**Solicitation Number**: W3827-25-R401

**Publication Date**: June 3, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: June 14, 2024, at 16:00

**Amendment Information**
The solicitation has undergone four amendments with the latest amendment being posted on June 24, 2024.

**Expected Contract Dates**
The expected start date of the contract is July 15, 2024, and the expected end date is March 31, 2025.

**Tender Status**: The tender has been cancelled.

**Procurement Information**
* **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Contracting Entity**
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Canadian Forces Recruiting Group Headquarters
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 25 Centurion Close, Borden, Ontario, Canada L0M 1C0

**Contact Information**
* **Contact Name**: Musa Nooristani
* **Contact Email**: musa.nooristani@forces.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (705) 770-7545

**Related Documents**
The solicitation package is available on the Canadian Government's Buy and Sell website:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39418/20240321-u-cfrg_hq_r4-mc_rfp_2_mystery_shopper.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39418/20240612-u-cfrg_r4-ms_questions_answered_bil_amdt_002.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39418/20240606-u-cfrg_r4-ms_questions_answered_bil_0.pdf

**Tender Description**
The Canadian Forces Recruiting Group (CFRG) is seeking a Mystery Shopper service to assess the quality of customer service interactions at Canadian Forces Recruiting Centers (CFRCs). The service will be executed through in-person visits, telephone, social media channels,
